import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Update a metrics account</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/v1/account-management/metrics-accounts/{metricsAccountId}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Please ensure to change the region in the URL to match your account's region.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"path","name":"metricsAccountId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3><strong className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"accountName"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Name of metrics account."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"planUts"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Usage plan for Unique Time Series (UTS). UTS defines the number of unique time series an account is allowed to have. If usage exceeds the plan, exceeding data points will not be processed."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"authorizedAccountsIds"} required={false} schemaName={"integer[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"IDs of authorized accounts","items":{"type":"integer"}}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

OK

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"ID of the metrics account"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"accountName"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Name of metrics account."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"token"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Metrics account token"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"createdAt"} required={false} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp of account creation"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"planUts"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Usage plan for Unique Time Series (UTS). UTS defines the number of unique time series an account is allowed to have. If usage exceeds the plan, exceeding data points will not be processed."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"authorizedAccountsIds"} required={false} schemaName={"integer[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"IDs of authorized accounts","items":{"type":"integer"}}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"id\": 0,\n  \"accountName\": \"string\",\n  \"token\": \"string\",\n  \"createdAt\": \"2024-08-04T11:38:13.765Z\",\n  \"planUts\": 0,\n  \"authorizedAccountsIds\": [\n    0\n  ]\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
